item.description:
TMIRCE and the Kier Byrnes Freedom runners are teaming up to bring the city some holiday cheer. We're co-hosting a great run, toy drive, and concert to benefit the Salvation Army.

What to expect | What to bring

TMIRCE will be running with KBFR and the Running Band at 7:15 and have the toy drive at 8pm. The toy drive will feature karaoke and live music by members of Three Day Threshold and Summer Villains.

Free pizza from Courtside Karaoke brought to you by TMIRCE and the Kier Byrnes Freedom Runners!

We'll have a big box to put toys in. Salvation Army anticipates helping between 1200-1500 children this Christmas, and our support will help them achieve that!Â 

jewelry
Lotion/Bath Gel
Wallets
Watches
Gift Cards (Claire's, Movie Tickets, Best Buy, etc.)
Arts and Crafts
Lego Sets
Books
Cooking Items
Sweatshirts

All other toys are also welcome, as we help children of all ages. The following are some really popular toys this year:

Barbie
Monster High
Lego Ninjago
MicroChargers
Dolls
Blocks
Crayola Art Sets
Cars/Toys

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Informal Freedom XMAS Toy Drive
